name: Al Bhed Primer II
details: Found in the Crusader's Lodge near attendant's desk.

name: Al Bhed Primer III
details: Found in the power room.  Re-obtainable in Bikanel Desert where Wakka was found.

name: Al Bhed Primer IV
details: Found in the tavern on the counter.  Only available after Yuna's sending

name: Al Bhed Primer V
details: Found on bridge. Re-obtainable in Bikanel Desert, by rubble near where Kimahri is found)

name: Al Bhed Primer VI
details: Found in the stadium - basement B

name: Al Bhed Primer VII
details: Found in the lower-left corner of the theatre

name: Al Bhed Primer VIII
details: Automatically given to you by Rin

name: Al Bhed Primer IX
details: Found on the Newroad, North

name: Al Bhed Primer X
details: Found on the Precipice, right before the elevator

name: Al Bhed Primer XI
details: Found behind a stone pillar on the way to the temple.

name: Al Bhed Primer XII
details: Found on the North Warf

name: Al Bhed Primer XIII
details: Found in the westmost house

name: Al Bhed Primer XIV
details: Found in the Agency if you tell Rin your studies are going well.  Re-obtainable in Bikanel Desert

name: Al Bhed Primer XV
details: Found across from O'aka in an alcove

name: Al Bhed Primer XVI
details: Found in front of agency

name: Al Bhed Primer XVII
details: Found in northern Central under ruins

name: Al Bhed Primer XVIII
details: Found in Central

name: Al Bhed Primer XX
details: Found in the Living Quarters on a bed. This is a missable Primer - you will not be able to return to Home

name: Al Bhed Primer XXI
details: Found at the end of Main Corridor. This is a missable Primer - you will not be able to return to Home

name: Al Bhed Primer XXII
details: Found in the Priest's Passage.  This is a missable Primer - you will not be able to return to Bevelle Temple

name: Al Bhed Primer XXIII
details: Found in western Central

name: Al Bhed Primer XXIV
details: Found on the left fork outside the temple

name: Al Bhed Primer XXV
details: Found in a western alcove

name: Al Bhed Primer XXVI
details: Found at the back of the cave near four chests

name: Al Bhed Primer I
details: Found in rear-right corner of Salvage Ship.  Re-obtainable in Bikanel Desert, northeastern area of the Oasis

name: Al Bhed Primer XIX
details: Found in first room after cutscene on the left.  This is a missable Primer - you will not be able to return to Home

name: Blossom Crown
description: Seems to have some connection with a hidden aeon...
details: Obtainable after capturing one of each fiend on Mt. Gagazet.  Unlocks one of the seals on the Chamber of the Fayth in Remiem Temple.

name: Cloudy Mirror
description: The surface is dark and clouded
details: Obtained after winning a Chocobo race at Remiem Temple.  Must be changed to the Celestial Mirror before being of any use.

name: Celestial Mirror
description: The surface is shiny and bright
details: Converted from the Cloudy Mirror, used to obtain the legendary weapons

name: Flower Scepter
description: Seems to have some connection with a hidden aeon...
details: Beat all of Belgemine's Aeons in Remiem Temple.  Unlocks one of the seals on the Chamber of the Fayth in Remiem Temple

name: Jecht's Sphere
description: A sphere recorded by Jecht ten years ago
details: The first of 10 spheres left behind by Jecht, Braska and Auron on their pilgrimage

name: Sun Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of the Sun
details: Partially powers up Tidus's Caladbolg.  Found in Zanarkand Dome after defeating Yunalesca.  If missed, you'll have to defeat an incredibly powerful boss to re-obtain.

name: Jupiter Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Jupiter
details: Partially powers up Wakka's World Champion.  Found in Besaid Aurochs' locker room

name: Sun Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of the Sun
details: Fully powers up Tidus's Caladbolg. To obtain, beat the Chocobo trainer in the Calm Lands with a time 0:00.

name: Jupiter Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Jupiter
details: Fully powers up Wakka's World Champion. Randomly appears with 50% chance as prize in a blitzball league once the player wins all three of Wakka's Overdrives in previous competitions.

name: Mars Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Mars
details: Partially powers up Auron's Masamune.  Obtained near the entrance to Mushroom Rock Road, along the final area of the Mi'ihen Highroad

name: Mars Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Mars
details: Fully powers up Auron's Masamune.  To obtain, unlock a total of ten Area Conquest or Species Conquest monsters

name: Mercury Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Mecury
details: Partially powers up Rikku's Godhand.  Obtained in a treasure chest in a shifting sand pit in the final area of Bikanel Desert

name: Moon Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of the Moon
details: Fully powers up Yuna's Nirvana.  Obtained after sending Belgemine

name: Saturn Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Saturn
details: Partially powers up Kimahri's Spirit Lance.  Obtained near the top of Mt. Gagazet

name: Mercury Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Mecury
details: Fully powers up Rikku's Godhand.  To obtain, the player must complete the cactuar sidequest on Bikanel Island (available after gaining the airship)

name: Moon Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of the Moon
details: Partially powers up Yuna's Nirvana.  Found on the beach in Besaid

name: Saturn Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Saturn
details: Fully powers up Kimahri's Spirit Lance.  Obtained after winning the butterfly game

name: Venus Crest
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Venus
details: Partially powers up Lulu's Onion Knight.  Obtained in the Farplane

name: Venus Sigil
description: A Celestial Token, fashioned in the shape of Venus
details: Fully powers up Lulu's Onion Knight.  Obtained by dodging 200 consecutive bolts

name: Mark of Conquest
description: Given to those who have surpassed mortal bounds
details: No use.  Obtained after mastering Monster Arena

name: Aeon's Soul
description: Allows you to raise the aeon's stats
details: Gift for fighting Belgemine at Calm Lands.  Allows the player to spend items to raise aeons' attributes.
